co.cask.coopr.store.cluster
Interface ClusterStore

All Superinterfaces:
ClusterStoreView
All Known Implementing Classes:
SQLClusterStore
public interface ClusterStore
extends ClusterStoreView

A full view of the cluster store for management purposes. Used within the system for managing jobs and tasks for operating on clusters.

Method Summary

          Deletes the cluster job that has the given id.

          Returns an immutable set of all ACTIVE or INCOMPLETE clusters that expire before timestamp.
